keywords.term: Pennsylvania -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Personal narratives.
United States. Army. Pennsylvania Cavalry Regiment, 19th (1863-1866).

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: James And Andrew and Thos I want you all to be good boys and do whatever your Mother tells you always and then you will keep yourself out of a good deal of trouble go to school always in proper time and try and get NO ldeportment whover of you that will have the best deportment shall get a nice present from me when I come back i will give you all a present But the Best Boy shall have the Best present Keep from bad boys dont have nothing to do with them
